title: CADtools6.0 for Adobe Illustrator CS3:CS4+Serial Number.7z
description:
New features in CADtools 6:
CS4 compatibility
Scale calculator in the CADdocument panel - use a selected object's dimensions to create a custom or 'best fit' scale and resize artwork
Proportion tool - resize an object to another object's dimensions
Measure distance tool - automatically determine distance by clicking and dragging between any two points
CADtools supports design projects of all sizes - view a partial client list. Do you need CADtools on multiple workstations? The CADtools terms of license follows the Adobe terms and one license is only valid for one workstation. Please call us for discounted pricing on multiple licenses.
$279.00 full / $149.00 upgrade



Summary of all major features:
Draw Illustrator art in any scale
Create a best fit scale and resize art to fit page with the scale calculator
Click-drag dimensions with your own style
Fully editable dimensions as text or numeric measurement
Snap to handy 2D or isometric grids
Numerically control objects with CADtracker
Create customized labels with text, numbers, alphabet or object geometry
Easy isometric tools for creating shapes, cubes and cylinders
Project or dimension flat art in isometric view
Precision editing with fillet, chamfer, trim and extend tools
Measure distance between any two points
Resize an object to another object's proportions with the proportion tool
Divide or cut paths into equal parts
Save or load CADtools settings as Presets
Scaled offset tool and more
